name: Zynth
description: The Zynth thrives on the natural electricity emitted by Wublin Island. This Monster stores the excess energy to power its glowing abdomen and produce a wonderful harmonic buzzing sound. A word of caution - don't stand too close to the Zynth, unless you want to reek of the orange fizz and ozone smell that accompanies it wherever it goes.
breedingCombo: None. Zap The Contents, And Power Up!
polarity: Negative from: Astropod, Negative toward: Whajje, Positive from: Gheegur, Positive toward: Dermit
